data.author: Patrick Van Cauteren

changelog.release_notes: Moved location of configuration page because of DropBox's changed policy regarding HTML pages.

Language can now be changed.
Supported languages are: English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish and Italian.

Simple watchface that shows the hour, day of the week (in Dutch), day of the month, battery status and Bluetooth status.  The time and date are shown using a big font to keep it readable.
Battery status is shown with colored circles to also keep it readable.
Bluetooth status is shown using a colored Bluetooth icon.

Only supports Pebble Time watches.

Warning: Currently only tested on Pebble Time simulator.  As soon as I have my Pebble Time watch, it will be tested on a real watch.  If you have a Pebble Time watch, please let me know whether it works as expected or not.

data.description:
Simple watchface that shows the hour, day of the week (in English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish or Italian), day of the month, battery status and bluetooth status.
The time and date are shown using a big font to keep it readable.
Battery status is shown with colored circles to also keep it readable.
Bluetooth status is shown using a colored bluetooth icon.

Only supports Pebble Time watches.

pebble@telenet.be

latest_release.release_notes: Moved location of configuration page because of DropBox's changed policy regarding HTML pages.

data.title: PVC's Essential
